title: EPiServer Announces Call For Entries For Customer Award Program
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 6:30 AM   EPiServer 
IRVINE, Calif., Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- EPiServer (TM), a leading provider of digital marketing and digital commerce solutions, today announced its call for entries for its EPiServer North America Website Awards 2015 program . 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150621/224559LOGO 
The awards are designed to recognize those brands that are defining next-generation of digital experience and customer engagement by celebrating excellence and best-in-class websites built on the EPiServer or Ektron(TM) platform. EPiServer and Ektron customers and partners can nominate websites built on the EPiServer or Ektron platform and launched in the last 18 months. See eligibility and guidelines for more information. 
Submissions will be accepted in three award categories: -- Best B2B website -- Best B2C website -- Best eCommerce website 
Winners will be those brands that demonstrate proficiency in the following areas: content; structure and navigation; multichannel and mobile capabilities; use of the EPiServer/Ektron platform; business results; and overall experience. 
Entries may be completed online at: www.episerver.com/campaigns/north-america/episerver-website-awards-2015 . The entry deadline is Oct. 30, 2015. 
A panel comprised of EPiServer senior executives and eCommerce and marketing technology industry veterans, including Guy Courtin, Vice President and Principal Analyst at Constellation Research ; Paul Demery, Managing Editor, B2B eCommerce, for Internet Retailer and the newly launched B2BecNews ; and Scott Liewehr, Co-Founder and CEO of Digital Clarity Group , has been assembled to evaluate award submissions. 
"This is an exciting time in the digital marketing industry - there have never been more opportunities to provide outstanding experiences for customers," said James Norwood, Executive Vice President Strategy and CMO of EPiServer. "Brands are rising to the challenge to deliver against today's greatest business imperatives for digital transformation and standout engagement, and our North American customer awards program seeks to honor those companies that are advancing their businesses through inspired and exceptional digital experiences." 
About EPiServer EPiServer connects digital commerce and digital marketing to help organizations create unique digital experiences for their customers, with measurable business results. The EPiServer Digital Experience Cloud(TM) combines content, commerce, multi-channel marketing, and predictive analytics in a single platform to work full-circle for businesses online - from intelligent real-time personalization and lead-generation through to conversion and repeat business - with unprecedented ease-of-use. Sitting at the center of the digital experience ecosystem, EPiServer empowers digital leaders to embrace disruptive, transformational strategies to deliver standout experiences for their customers - everywhere they engage. Founded in 1994, EPiServer has offices in Australia, Denmark, Finland, The Netherlands, Norway, Singapore, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, UAE, UK and the USA. For more information visit www.episerver.com

Submissions and any subsequent award confer no further rights or obligations on any party involved, nor act as a joint venture, partnership, employment, or agency relationship between parties.
